definitions: A portable device designed to elevate a laptop computer, often featuring adjustable height and angle, and capable of being collapsed into a compact form for easy transport.
An accessory that provides an ergonomic viewing and typing experience for laptops by raising the screen to eye level and allowing for better airflow, which can be folded for storage or travel.
examples: I bought a foldable laptop stand for my home office.
The foldable laptop stand fits easily into my backpack.
She adjusted the height of her foldable laptop stand.
Many remote workers use a foldable laptop stand for better posture.
